Di akhir episod, Eliza tidak memberi kelulusan bayaran keraian yang dituntut oleh Encik Amran, ini menyebabkan Amran sangat marah dengan Eliza.

programme.title: Beyond Skyline
programme.desc: Seorang detektif memulakan usaha tanpa henti untuk membebaskan anaknya daripada kapal perang asing yang ngeri.

programme.title: Budak Magik Ep12
programme.desc: Episod – 12 memaparkan kisah lucu bagaimana Sohot telah dibawa oleh jin bernama Rakib ke suatu tempat hingga kawan-kawanya susah hati dan menyatakan bahawa dia telah disorok oleh bunian. Rakib telah membawa Salim ke suatu tempat yang sama Sohot sampai terlebih dahulu dan kemudian jin Rakib telah meminjam badan Salim untuk mendampingi Hariman. Sohot telah kembali kepangkuan Hariman dan Salim, sementara Cikgu Razif keluar makan bersama Maira, Imran dan Suraya, emak Maira. Hariman telah meminta Salim mencari buloh untuk dibuat layang layang khas untuk Haikal kerana hendak mengambil hatinya sementara Zara dan Haikal sedang mencari buloh untuk membuat layang-layang

programme.title: Terowong Ep3
programme.desc: Episod 3 membawa tajuk "Penunggu" memaparkan sebuah lagi cerita seram yang berlatar belakangkan Terowong. Ianya mengisahkan seorang lelaki Amin bertemu dan di ganggu seorang wanita tua (penunggu terowong) yang menakutkan di dalam terowong. Dia mengigau diganggu perempuan tua (Penunggu) . Suatu hari ibunya terjumpa sehelai baju berdarah di dalam biliknya. Amin telah merayu kepada nenek tua (penunggu) itu supaya tidak mengganggunya lagi. Nenek (penunggu) itu berkata bahawa itu adalah tempatnya dan tidak sabar menunggu Amin. Amin tidak tidur selama seminggu kerana takut di ganggu oleh penunggu tersebut dan tubuhnya menjadi tidak terurus, busuk dan pucat. Suatu hari nenek itu menjelma dihadapan ibunya dan mengatakan akan mengambil Amin. Penunggu itu sayangkan Amin dan ibunya berkeras untuk menolong Amir walaupun Amir tidak mahu ibunya mendapatkan bantuan khidmat bomoh. Jin (penunggu) itu memarahi ibu Amin kerana mengganggunya dengan memanggil bomoh. Penunggu tersebut juga mengganggu Nadia kekasih Amin serta melarangnya mendekati Amin. Suatu hari ibu dan tunang Amin menjumpai Amin mati dilanggar kereta di dalam terowong itu. Nenek itu membawa Amin pergi dari terowong tersebut dengan memimpinya.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Selepas percubaan membunuh diri yang gagal, seorang wanita hamil mendapat keupayaan untuk melihat hantu.

programme.title: Gila-Gila
programme.desc: Jaafar, seorang pembantu di rumah orang kaya bernama Dato' Jaafar Pangku. Niat ingin mengubah nasibnya, Jaafar pun mengambil cuti dua bulan dan pergi ke Kuala Lumpur. Sebelum itu, dia telah meminjam baju dan wang majikannya sebanyak RM3000 atas alasan melawat neneknya yang sakit. Setibanya dia di sana, Jaafar bertemu dengan Kathy dan jatuh cinta. Hal sebenar terbongkar apabila wangnya habis dan terpaksa pulang semula ke Sabah.

programme.title: Panglima Badol
programme.desc: Badol ingin keluar merantau mencari pengalaman hidup seperti apa yang dilakukan bapanya. Ditentang ibunya namun direlakan dengan satu syarat - tidak boleh mengambil tahu perihal orang lain. Setibanya di sebuah pulau, kekecohan berlaku apabila Maya Sari, anak angkat Datuk Tumpang dilarikan konco Datuk Panglima Wira. Badol secara tidak sengaja berjaya menyelamatkan Maya Sari dan diberi gelaran Panglima Badol.

programme.title: Salah Bapak
programme.desc: Jamil dan Osman terpaksa melalui pelbagai rintangan untuk menuntut hak mereka ke atas harta peninggalan Al-Sagof, bapa mereka yang telah meninggal dunia. Pak Joko ingin cuba membolot harta Al-Sagof lalu merancang pelbagai taktik kotor untuk mendapatkannya. Seroja, gadis yang menyewa tapak tanak bapa mereka untuk membuka warung turut terlibat apabila dia digunakan Pak Joko.

programme.title: Konstabel Mamat
programme.desc: Akibat kelalaian dalam operasi menangkap ketua gengster iaitu Mail Musang yang merupakan bapa ayam sindiket pelacuran di Kuala Lumpur, Mamat digantung tugas selama tiga bulan. Meskipun digantung, Mamat tetap rajin dan menjalankan tugas menangkap penjenayah. Mamat yang jatuh cinta dengan kekasih gelap kepada Mail Musang telah diketahui olehnya. Kejadian ini telah membawa kepada penangkapan Mail dan Mamat tidak lagi digantung tugas.

programme.title: Gila-Gila
programme.desc: Jaafar, seorang pembantu di rumah orang kaya bernama Dato' Jaafar Pangku. Niat ingin mengubah nasibnya, Jaafar pun mengambil cuti dua bulan dan pergi ke Kuala Lumpur. Sebelum itu, dia telah meminjam baju dan wang majikannya sebanyak RM3000 atas alasan melawat neneknya yang sakit. Setibanya dia di sana, Jaafar bertemu dengan Kathy dan jatuh cinta. Hal sebenar terbongkar apabila wangnya habis dan terpaksa pulang semula ke Sabah.

programme.title: Guru Badul
programme.desc: Badul diambil bekerja di pejabat Hj. Lamin sebagai seorang pengutip hutang. Badul sebenarnya berpura-pura menjadi orang alim membuatkan Hj. Lamin sangat tertarik akan perwatakannya itu. Dia banyak mempelajari ilmu agama dengan Badul dan ingin menjadikannya sebagai seorang menantu. Namun satu insiden telah memecahkan rahsianya apabila Hj. Lamin terlihat Badul sedang menari-nari.

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Hamid dan Dharma keluar merantau mencari kekayaan di bandar bertemu Nora dan Norlia. Hamid, penjual jagung rebus dan Dharma, penjaga lif tinggal di rumah milik pasangan suami isteri dan berjiran bersama Nora dan Norlia. Kerana ingin mencari kekayaan dengan menggunakan jalan mudah, pelbagai kesusahan terpaksa dihadapi oleh mereka berdua.

programme.title: Ragam Pemandu
programme.desc: Pemandu yang setia dan tidak pernah mengeluh, Hamid tidak disukai oleh isteri tuannya, Rubiah. Tuannya, Rahim pula seorang yang baik hati dan sukakan Hamid. Dia sering membantu membiayai pelajaran anak-anak Hamid dan menyelesaikan masalah yang dihadapi olehnya. Satu pertengkaran menyebabkan Hamid berhenti kerja namun Rahim tampil membantu mengambilnya bekerja di syarikat insurans miliknya.

programme.title: Adik Manja
programme.desc: Guru lelaki pertama di sekolah berasrama penuh perempuan terpaksa menyembunyikan satu rahsia besar apabila terpaksa membawa pulang seorang bayi lelaki. Pelbagai helah terpaksa digunakannya namun diketahui juga oleh pelajar-pelajar institusi itu. Pelajar-pelajar tersebut mengambil keputusan untuk membantunya bersama seorang lagi guru di situ.

programme.title: Langit Petang
programme.desc: Seorang wartawan muda, Hafiz ingin membantu kekasihnya, Ruby. Ruby bergelut untuk mengatasi trauma dan pengalaman buruk dari zaman kecilnya. Hafiz sedang menulis rencana tentang kisah Pak Arif yang memiliki tanah pusaka di kampung. Hashim pula ingin membeli kesemua tanah miliknya dan menggunakan taktik jahat untuk mendapatkannya. Ternyata, Ruby adalah anak saudara kepada Pak Arif.

programme.title: Talak
programme.desc: Johan dan Liza sering bertengkar sehingga membawa kepada penceraian. Tetapi setiap kali ianya terjadi, mereka akan merujuk kembali. Tanpa disedari, Johan telah pun melafazkan talak kepada Liza sebanyak tiga kali, ini menyebabkan mereka tidak boleh merujuk kembali. Johan terpaksa mencari lelaki yang boleh dipercayai untuk berkahwin dengan Liza supaya mereka boleh kembali bersama. Namun, malang menimpa apabila lelaki untuk tidak mahu melepaskan Liza.

programme.title: Kemarau Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda kampung yang ingin membawa perubahan di kampungnya. Pergi menuntut ilmu di bandar, pemuda ini pulang semula ke kampung selepas selesai pengajiannya. Ingin cuba melakukan perubahan demi kemajuan di kampung namun tidak semua bersetuju dengan perubahan yang dibawa olehnya. Pelbagai halangan perlu ditempuhinya namun dia bersikap pantang berundur sebelum berjuang.

programme.title: Tak Ori Tapi Ok
programme.desc: Keinginan seorang pengarah filem yang ingin menghasilkan naskhah baru. Yassin mahu melakukan kemunculan semula setelah sekian lama menemui jalan buntu dalam kerjayanya. Menemui seseorang yang mahu membiayai projek terbarunya, dia pun mula mencari pelakon-pelakon untuk membintanginya. Pelbagai rintangan dihadapinya dalam mencari pelakon yang boleh meniru gaya seperti P.Ramlee.

programme.title: Konstabel Mamat
programme.desc: Akibat kelalaian dalam operasi menangkap ketua gengster iaitu Mail Musang yang merupakan bapa ayam sindiket pelacuran di Kuala Lumpur, Mamat digantung tugas selama tiga bulan. Meskipun digantung, Mamat tetap rajin dan menjalankan tugas menangkap penjenayah. Mamat yang jatuh cinta dengan kekasih gelap kepada Mail Musang telah diketahui olehnya. Kejadian ini telah membawa kepada penangkapan Mail dan Mamat tidak lagi digantung tugas.

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Hamid dan Dharma keluar merantau mencari kekayaan di bandar bertemu Nora dan Norlia. Hamid, penjual jagung rebus dan Dharma, penjaga lif tinggal di rumah milik pasangan suami isteri dan berjiran bersama Nora dan Norlia. Kerana ingin mencari kekayaan dengan menggunakan jalan mudah, pelbagai kesusahan terpaksa dihadapi oleh mereka berdua.

programme.title: Ragam Pemandu
programme.desc: Pemandu yang setia dan tidak pernah mengeluh, Hamid tidak disukai oleh isteri tuannya, Rubiah. Tuannya, Rahim pula seorang yang baik hati dan sukakan Hamid. Dia sering membantu membiayai pelajaran anak-anak Hamid dan menyelesaikan masalah yang dihadapi olehnya. Satu pertengkaran menyebabkan Hamid berhenti kerja namun Rahim tampil membantu mengambilnya bekerja di syarikat insurans miliknya.

programme.title: Salah Bapak
programme.desc: Jamil dan Osman terpaksa melalui pelbagai rintangan untuk menuntut hak mereka ke atas harta peninggalan Al-Sagof, bapa mereka yang telah meninggal dunia. Pak Joko ingin cuba membolot harta Al-Sagof lalu merancang pelbagai taktik kotor untuk mendapatkannya. Seroja, gadis yang menyewa tapak tanak bapa mereka untuk membuka warung turut terlibat apabila dia digunakan Pak Joko.

programme.title: Panglima Badol
programme.desc: Badol ingin keluar merantau mencari pengalaman hidup seperti apa yang dilakukan bapanya. Ditentang ibunya namun direlakan dengan satu syarat - tidak boleh mengambil tahu perihal orang lain. Setibanya di sebuah pulau, kekecohan berlaku apabila Maya Sari, anak angkat Datuk Tumpang dilarikan konco Datuk Panglima Wira. Badol secara tidak sengaja berjaya menyelamatkan Maya Sari dan diberi gelaran Panglima Badol.

programme.title: Adik Manja
programme.desc: Guru lelaki pertama di sekolah berasrama penuh perempuan terpaksa menyembunyikan satu rahsia besar apabila terpaksa membawa pulang seorang bayi lelaki. Pelbagai helah terpaksa digunakannya namun diketahui juga oleh pelajar-pelajar institusi itu. Pelajar-pelajar tersebut mengambil keputusan untuk membantunya bersama seorang lagi guru di situ.

programme.title: Guru Badul
programme.desc: Badul diambil bekerja di pejabat Hj. Lamin sebagai seorang pengutip hutang. Badul sebenarnya berpura-pura menjadi orang alim membuatkan Hj. Lamin sangat tertarik akan perwatakannya itu. Dia banyak mempelajari ilmu agama dengan Badul dan ingin menjadikannya sebagai seorang menantu. Namun satu insiden telah memecahkan rahsianya apabila Hj. Lamin terlihat Badul sedang menari-nari.

programme.title: Gila-Gila
programme.desc: Jaafar, seorang pembantu di rumah orang kaya bernama Dato' Jaafar Pangku. Niat ingin mengubah nasibnya, Jaafar pun mengambil cuti dua bulan dan pergi ke Kuala Lumpur. Sebelum itu, dia telah meminjam baju dan wang majikannya sebanyak RM3000 atas alasan melawat neneknya yang sakit. Setibanya dia di sana, Jaafar bertemu dengan Kathy dan jatuh cinta. Hal sebenar terbongkar apabila wangnya habis dan terpaksa pulang semula ke Sabah.

programme.title: Bob Punya Baby

programme.title: Gerak Khas The Movie III
programme.desc: Unit Gerak Khas cuba menyelesaikan kes pembunuhan Suzana di sebuah pangsapuri mewah yang dipercayai mempunyai kaitan dengan Ramon (Faizal Hussein). Ramon merupakan adik kepada Frankie. penjenayah yang ditumpaskan oleh Unit Gerak Khas dalam satu operasi menentang kumpulan militan dan sindiket pengedaran dadah 2 tahun yang lalu.

programme.title: Taman Langsat Mayestik
programme.desc: Ozie, seorang pengarah filem, menjemput seorang penerbit untuk membuat filem seram. Ozie mengupah pasukan casting, tetapi dia tidak berpuas hati dengan hasilnya. Jadi dia mempunyai idea untuk memilih pelakon di lokasi paling berhantu di Jakarta.

programme.desc: Seorang jutawan telah mewasiatkan kepada peguamnya supaya mencari waris-warisnya yang berhak menerima harta bernilai lebih dari RM30 juta. Semua waris disyaratkan supaya berada di bangalo arwah di sebuah bukit peranginan selama 33 hari bagi melayakkan mereka mewarisi harta pusaka tersebut.

programme.title: Relationshit
programme.desc: Alitt, seorang pengarang terlaris, yang sentiasa disokong oleh teman wanitanya, Wina. Namun, hubungan mereka terjalin kerana Wina akur dengan permintaan ibunya. Sehingga akhirnya Alitt bertemu dengan Vivi.

programme.title: Hujan Bulan Juni
programme.desc: Pingkan (Velove Vexia), seorang pensyarah muda di Universitas Sastera Jepang Indonesia, berpeluang belajar di Jepun selama dua tahun. Sarwono (Adipati Dolken) sedih mendengar berita bahawa dia akan ditinggalkan oleh Pingkan.

programme.title: Seutas Gelang Emas
programme.desc: Adam tinggal dengan ibunya di kampung. Berjawatan tinggi dan bergaji besar menyebabkan ibunya, Hasnah cukup bangga. Satu hari Bedah, penjual barang kemas, datang ke rumahnya untuk mengajak ke kenduri doa selamat. Di samping itu Bedah membuka juga barangan kemasnya. programme.title: Pening-Pening Lalat
programme.desc: Dino adalah banduan yang berjaya melarikan diri dari penjara. Polis menyiarkan berita mengenainya dan menawarkan hadiah RM10,000 kepada sesiapa yang berjaya menangkapnya. Jadi Dino bersembunyi di dalam hutan di mana dia bertemu Zakaria dan Aliza.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Debu Debu Kasih
programme.desc: Suzana berumur 23 tahun, mengikut kawan-kawannya ke Terengganu, untuk menghilangkan rasa sunyi. di terengganu suzana bertemu Hassan, terbitlah rasa cinta. oleh kerana salahfaham berlakulah pertengkaran antara Hassan dan Suzana.

programme.title: My Illegal Wife
programme.desc: Clarise mahukan suami oleh kerana desakan keluarga. Selepas kemalangan dia terjaga di sebuah pulau dengan Henry, yang mengalami amnesia. Dia mengambil kesempatan daripada situasi itu dan memperkenalkan dirinya sebagai isterinya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Mock 2 For 3
programme.desc: menceritakan sekumpulan remaja yang mencipta model mainan baru dan cuba untuk menjual ideanya ke syarikat besar tetapi tidak diterima. Id ialah pengganti syarikat itu, baru pulang dari Jepun. Dia mencadangkan syarikat itu perlu membina mainan baru di sekitar model yang ditolak sebelum ini. Syarikat itu tidak dapat mencari pencipta, jadi mereka hanya mengeluarkannya. oleh kerana melihat rekaan mereka dicuri, merka merancang untuk membalas dendam.

programme.title: Sengketa Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda telah ditipu dalam perniagaan . Untuk membalas dendam dia mencolek seorang wanita dalam usaha untuk menjejak penipu itu. Bagaimanapun akhirnya dia jatuh cinta dengan wanita tersebut lalu membawa balik menemui ibubapanya.

programme.title: Utang Nyak Gue Lunas Di Pelaminan
programme.desc: Berkahwin di usia muda membuatkan Kinan dan Alvin terpaksa menjalaninya dengan penuh liku-liku, masalah timbul apabila bekas kekasih Alvin datang dan kacau semuanya.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep133
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Star Ep64
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep13
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep93
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep134
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. programme.title: Fotografer Munduran Dong Tampannya, Nikung Syantiknya Pembantu Notnot
programme.desc: Impian Rudi memang bukan untuk menjadi doktor seperti kehendak ibu bapanya. Lalu Rudi memilih Jakarta sebagai kota pelariannya untuk menjadi seorang jurugambar profesional. Siapa sangka hari pertama dia bertemu Surti sebenarnya menjadikan Jakarta sebuah kota yang sangat istimewa.

programme.title: Suster El Ep6
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep16
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: Bu Guru Cantiknya Ada Masalah Apa Sih
programme.desc: Apa agaknya masalah Monica? Kerana selain menjadi guru, dia juga bekerja sebagai artis. Dia bertemu dengan Hendra di sekolah yang selalu membuat hatinya berdegup kencang. Mereka mungkin jatuh cinta satu sama lain ataupun tidak?

programme.title: Kamera Cinta Ep10
programme.desc: Kamera Cinta adalah adaptasi format antarabangsa dari "Hear Me Love Me See Me", di mana seorang wanita bujang akan bertemujanji dengan 6 orang lelaki tanpa dapat melihat satu sama lain. Ketika bertemujanji, lelaki akan menggunakan kamera aksi di badan mereka dan wanita bujang dapat berkenalan dengan rakan, keluarga atau rakan sekerja mereka. Hanya seorang lelaki yang akan dipilih dan akan melangkah ke peringkat seterusnya.

programme.title: Fotografer Munduran Dong Tampannya, Nikung Syantiknya Pembantu Notnot
programme.desc: Impian Rudi memang bukan untuk menjadi doktor seperti kehendak ibu bapanya. Lalu Rudi memilih Jakarta sebagai kota pelariannya untuk menjadi seorang jurugambar profesional. Siapa sangka hari pertama dia bertemu Surti sebenarnya menjadikan Jakarta sebuah kota yang sangat istimewa.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep13
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Perjuangan Gadis Penjual Pecel Yang Terpaksa Tinggal Di Kandang Kambing
programme.desc: Putri membantu neneknya menjual pecel keliling setiap hari. Suatu hari, mereka diusir dari rumah kontrakannya karena tidak bisa membayar uang sewa. Akhirnya, Putri dan neneknya tinggal di sebuah gubuk yang berdekatan dengan kandang kambing.

programme.title: Konser Dari Rhoma untuk Irama
programme.desc: Konsert sambutan ulang tahun Rhoma Irama, Raja Dangdut!

programme.title: Konser Pestaria
programme.desc: Konsert Pestaria: Gabungan eklektik gaya muzik dan kolaborasi menarik di pentas!

programme.title: Tazza: One Eyed Jack
programme.desc: A young poker joins a poker team lead by the legendary One-Eyed Jack to pay off his debt, but a single mistake puts the entire team in a life-or-death situation.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: When a high school gym teacher helps his student track down her missing friend, he finds himself faced with a conspiracy related to her disappearance.

programme.title: The Tooth And The Nail
programme.desc: Based on the novel of the same name by Bill S. Ballinger, the story tells of a magician who plans the most elaborate trick in order to uncover the hidden conspiracy behind his fiance's death.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: A Special Lady
programme.desc: A woman who becomes the second-in-command of a gangster organization-turned-leading business entity, fights against the ruthless world of man's society, to protect her only son.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hopes of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: Meet The In-Laws
programme.desc: Hyun Joon and his girlfriend Da Hong are ready to tie the knot, but there's one big problem: Da Hong's father is strongly against him because of his hometown. Will they ever make it to the altar?

programme.title: Secret Reunion
programme.desc: A NIS agent is discharged after failing to stop the murder of a N. Korean dissident. Years later, he bumps into the N. Korean spy who was involved in the mission and quickly forms a bond.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: Marrying The Mafia 2: Enemy In Law
programme.desc: When In-Jae, the eldest son of a mafia family meets the beautiful Jin-Kyung, his mother is more than pleased but when they find out she is a prosecutor, it brings chaos to their family.

programme.title: Emergency Declaration
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths on plane forced the pilot to call for an unconditional emergency landing.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Salut D'Amour
programme.desc: Follow the heart-warming tale about a pair of elderly people who, with the support of family and friends, find love despite their failing minds and weakening bodies.

programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: When a bad-boy movie star hires a real gangster to take on an opposing role to avoid a scandal after beating a fellow actor half to death, he gets more than he bargained for from this replacement.

programme.title: We Are Brothers
programme.desc: Two brothers separated at birth reunite 30 years later and go on a road trip in search of their mom with Alzheimer's.

programme.title: Iris: New Generation
programme.desc: Three years after a secret agent's tragic death at the hands of terrorist group IRIS, team leader Joon-han recruits a team to stop IRIS once and for all.

programme.title: The Glorious My Revenge
programme.desc: Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: When a high school gym teacher helps his student track down her missing friend, he finds himself faced with a conspiracy related to her disappearance.

programme.title: Punch
programme.desc: A dysfunctional mentor-mentee relationship is forged between a rebellious high school student from a poor household and his meddlesome homeroom teacher who moves in next door.

programme.title: Miss Granny
programme.desc: Complications and hilarity ensues when a 70-year-old woman living unhappily with her son's family is magically restored to her beauty of 50 years earlier.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hopes of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: She'S On Duty
programme.desc: In order to catch a gangster, a cop goes undercover as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: Secret Reunion
programme.desc: A NIS agent is discharged after failing to stop the murder of a N. Korean dissident. Years later, he bumps into the N. Korean spy who was involved in the mission and quickly forms a bond.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Meet The In-Laws
programme.desc: Hyun Joon and his girlfriend Da Hong are ready to tie the knot, but there's one big problem: Da Hong's father is strongly against him because of his hometown. Will they ever make it to the altar?

programme.title: The Face Reader
programme.desc: Nae-gyeong is the most skillful face reader in all of Joeson dynasty. After his abilities are acknowledged, he gets pulled into a royal power struggle involving the King's successor.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: The Beast
programme.desc: Two rival detectives compete against each other to catch the notorious killer who shakes up Korea by their gruesome murders.

programme.title: Recipe for Farewell Ep2
programme.desc: A heart-touching kitchen diary of a husband who doesn’t know how to cook but prepares a table for his wife who was diagnosed with terminal cancer after they separated.

programme.title: Europe Outside Your Tent: Norway Ep5
programme.desc: Yoo Hae-jin, Jin Seon-kyu, Yoon Kyun-sang ,and Park Ji-hwan reunited for a new journey, this time on a Winter camp in Norway, to fulfill their life dream of sighting the Northern Lights.

programme.title: Best of I Can See Your Voice 9 Ep7
programme.desc: ‘I Can See Your Voice’ is back in Season 9! Join the hosts and special celebrity guests to guess which of the contestants are skilled or tone-deaf just by looking at their appearance!

programme.title: The Sixth Sense 2 Ep12
programme.desc: Yoo Jae-suk and celebrity hosts return for a second season! They will visit the hottest places or people in Korea and use their 'sixth sense' to identify the fake place or people set up by the crew.

programme.title: Best of The Backpacker Chef Ep17
programme.desc: Baek Jong-won will transform into a catering chef with Ahn Bo-hyun, Oh Dae-hwan, and DinDin! Arriving only with backpacks, they have to prepare a large amount of customized food within limited time.

programme.title: The Genius Paik Ep12
programme.desc: Will Paik Jong-won be able to successfully run a restaurant overseas? With the help of Lee Jang-woo, BamBam, Yuri and John Park, he will start his business in the barren land of K-food – Africa and Italy.

programme.title: Delightfully Deceitful Ep9
programme.desc: Ro-woom is a genius scam artist who lacks empathy, and Moo-young is an attorney who is excessively empathetic by nature. To battle evil, these two opposites team up to form an unlikely alliance.

programme.title: Europe Outside Your Tent: Norway Ep6
programme.desc: Yoo Hae-jin, Jin Seon-kyu, Yoon Kyun-sang ,and Park Ji-hwan reunited for a new journey, this time on a Winter camp in Norway, to fulfill their life dream of sighting the Northern Lights.

programme.title: Busan Boys: Sydney Bound Ep6
programme.desc: Korea's first working holiday variety show where four Busan boys work, live, and travel in Sydney. While taking short-term jobs, the four will meet the locals and learn about their culture.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep3334
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46434644
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1823
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3626
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2054
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep160
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963, and ruthlessly carved an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This movie is inspired by the true story of real-life hero Huo Yuan Jia. When a fight destroys the reputation of this renowned martial arts champion along with the lives of his family, Huo’s path to redemption brings him face-to-face with the most ferocious opponents in the world.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome life’s challenges.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the other’s mole.

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: A bachelorette weekend spins hilariously out of control when three friends wake up naked on a beach and find themselves handcuffed to a mysterious briefcase, with local gangsters in pursuit. They must regain memories of what happened that weekend if they hope to go back home safely!

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily’s Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again…

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: This is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wai’s most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly man’s spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin’s trust, Nick becomes his protégé and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tang’s demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tang’s strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, “The Eagle Shooting Heroes” is loosely based on Louis Cha’s classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hung’s action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves “The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real “Chosen Sleuth” instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to trap Wong’s disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong thus to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: What Price Honesty
programme.desc: In this period martial arts thriller, three police graduates are assigned to a town rife with crimes and corruption. They vow to uphold justice but are hampered by their corrupt superior, resulting in them putting their lives and the lives of their beloved in danger.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: Village Of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Judgement Of An Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue…

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: After many years as a respected actor and action choreographer, the Shaw Studio finally gave the dependable and commendable Hsu Hsia a chance to direct his own movies. He didn't waste the opportunity, inviting three other kung-fu designers to help on this fight-filled thriller. Wang Yu, co-star of such classics as Dirty Ho and The Kid With A Tattoo, here takes center stage as a young rascal caught between an anti-Ching Confederation and violent, vengeful Ching troops. But when he discovers that the good guys are led by master martial arts actor Jen Shih-kuan and the bad guys are led by the incredible Huang Cheng-li everyone knows that loads of great kung-fu is in store.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Two forbidden lovers, Zhang Zhen and Yue Nu, are killed by four villains and left behind their twin babies. Yue Nu's elder sister hopes to restore the clan's honour and separates the twins, arranging for them to be raised by competing clans. 18 years later, the twins meet and fight against each other, bringing chaos to the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. One year later, when he sends for Li, her poor health cannot stand the arduous journey and she arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan head’s son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: The Kid With The Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: The Story Of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents’ kung fu styles.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sing’s wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: The Duel Of The Century
programme.desc: Liu Yung and Korean "Venom" Sun Chien team up to investigate the martial-art murders of a supposedly mortally wounded swordsman, only to find deception, death, double-dealings, imposters and one deadly duel after another.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Duke’s daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays Kwei Wu, who stumbles onto a kidnapping with his wife Kan Lien-chu (Chin Ping) at the Red Lotus Temple. Kan sends Kwei to go for reinforcements while she stays to fight the kidnappers, but she is captured and imprisoned in an iron cage. As Kwei returns with reinforcements, he must also race to the temple to save his wife.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Liu’s disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends’ help.

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Ming’s guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Film, Starring, Prithviraj Sukumaran, Aditi Balan, Athmeeya Rajan & Others

programme.desc: Tamil Action film, Starring - Mammookka, Unni Mukundan, Anu Sithara & Siddique

programme.title: Irumugan
programme.desc: Irumugan features Actor Vikram, Actress Nayanthara & Actress Nithya Menon. Iru Mugan is a science fiction action thriller film written and directed by Anand Shankar. The story revolves around a RAW agent couple (Vikram & Nayantara) and an evil minded scientist named Love. One of the Blockbuster Hit movie in 2016

programme.title: Andhadhun

programme.title: Karishma Kali Kaa
programme.desc: Parvati, devotee of Goddess Kali, is raped while trying to protect the temple jewels. She is saved by a god man who grants her special powers and asks her to kill the culprits and get back the jewels.

programme.title: Kadamban
programme.desc: Kadamban along with a group of villagers wages a war against a powerful businessman, who wants to destroy the forest surrounding Kadamban's village for his greed.

programme.title: Sanam Bewafa
programme.desc: Two families that are traditional rivals are shocked when their children fall in love with each other. After great difficulty, the households agree to the marriage, but things do not go as planned.

programme.title: Kambakkht Ishq
programme.desc: Simrita, a doctor, performs her first surgery on Viraj, a man she hates. She soon realises that she accidentally left her watch inside his body and must do whatever it takes to save her career.

programme.title: Khooni Jung
programme.desc: Shiv Kashi's father puts their family name in jeopardy through nasty tactics. When Shiv finds out about his crimes, he struggles to restore his family's honour.

programme.title: Dil Ka Rishta
programme.desc: Jai, a multimillionaire, is secretly in love with Tia whose husband he kills unintentionally while driving. After she loses her memory in the accident, she eventually falls for a guilt-ridden Jai.

programme.desc: Jai, a multimillionaire, is secretly in love with Tia whose husband he kills unintentionally while driving. After she loses her memory in the accident, she eventually falls for a guilt-ridden Jai.

programme.title: Rangeela
programme.desc: Mili's ambition of becoming a famous actor is met with several hurdles when Raj Kamal, a noted actor, and Munna, her childhood friend, both fall in love with her.

programme.title: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
programme.desc: Sunil tries every trick to win over Anna, who is in love with Chris. In a desperate attempt to win her love, he creates misunderstandings between her and Chris.

programme.title: Kambakkht Ishq
programme.desc: Simrita, a doctor, performs her first surgery on Viraj, a man she hates. She soon realises that she accidentally left her watch inside his body and must do whatever it takes to save her career.

programme.title: Mere Hindustan Ki Kasam 2
programme.desc: Two journalists working in rival organisations are always at loggerheads with each other. However, an unnatural bond develops between them when they are sent to report the Kargil War together.

programme.title: Khooni Yudh
programme.desc: When a superstar named Swathi visits Hyderabad, she gets an offer to work in a short film. However, when her film crew moves into a guest house owned by a telepath, Swathi experiences strange things.

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh
programme.desc: After her family forces her to get married, Kavya runs away from her house. When her brother goes in search of her, he finds her with a young man and assumes him to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Oh Darling Yeh Hai India
programme.desc: A gangster plans to take over the country by replacing the president with a lookalike. A man and woman, who are complete strangers, get wind of this conspiracy and try to save the country.

programme.title: Airlift
programme.desc: Ranjit Katiyal, an Indian businessman, leads a happy and successful life in Kuwait with his family. However, when Iraq invades Kuwait, he decides to risk his life to save his stranded countrymen.

programme.title: Cinebuzz
programme.desc: The host interviews several famous personalities, shares the latest news of the Bollywood industry and reviews the latest movies.

programme.title: Main Hoon Na
programme.desc: Major Ram is given orders to go undercover as a college student to protect a general's daughter from a rogue soldier. He even has to fulfil his dying father's desire to reconcile with his family.

programme.title: Main Hoon Na
programme.desc: Major Ram is given orders to go undercover as a college student to protect a general's daughter from a rogue soldier. He even has to fulfil his dying father's desire to reconcile with his family.

programme.title: Jeet
programme.desc: Karan, a feared hitman, falls in love with Kajal but she is married off to Raju. However, when Raju plans to expose his father's illegal activities, Karan is hired to kill him.

programme.title: Chalte Chalte
programme.desc: Raj, the owner of a truck company, pursues Priya, a fashion designer, and eventually gets married to her. Differences between the two lead to a separation that threatens to destroy their relationship.

programme.title: Airlift
programme.desc: Ranjit Katiyal, an Indian businessman, leads a happy and successful life in Kuwait with his family. However, when Iraq invades Kuwait, he decides to risk his life to save his stranded countrymen.

programme.title: Seetharama Kalyana
programme.desc: Arya, a righteous man, falls in love with a small-town woman named Geetha, unaware of the obstacles that lie ahead for both of them.

programme.title: Adventures Of Tarzan
programme.desc: While on the lookout for a fabled tribe in a forest, Ruby happens to meet Tarzan, an ape-like man, and falls in love with him. However, her father and her fiance have evil plans for him.

programme.title: Beqabu
programme.desc: Raja helps imprison a terrorist who then murders him. Years later, Raja's girlfriend comes across his lookalike in Nepal and decides to find the truth.

programme.title: Real Winner
programme.desc: Frustrated with Shakti's rebellious nature, his parents send him to stay at his grandparents' house where he falls in love with Neelima. But he is shocked to learn that her marriage is already fixed.

programme.title: Force 2
programme.desc: ACP Yashwardhan, a dutiful and honest police officer, teams up with RAW agent Kamaljit Kaur to expose an inside informer who leaks sensitive information to a foreign agency targeting the RAW agents.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

programme.title: Thunderbolt And Lightfoot
programme.desc: With the help of an irreverent young sidekick, a bank robber gets his old gang back together to organize a daring new heist.

programme.title: The School Of Rock
programme.desc: After being kicked out of his rock band, Dewey Finn becomes a substitute teacher of an uptight elementary private school, only to try and turn his class into a rock band.

programme.title: Bounce
programme.desc: A man switches plane tickets with another man who dies in that plane in a crash. The man falls in love with the deceased one's wife.

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: A British student at a 1960s American high school must prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

programme.title: The Vikings
programme.desc: A slave and a Viking prince fight for the love of a captive princess.

programme.title: Speed Racer
programme.desc: Fearlessly hurtling down the track, careening around, over and through the competition in his thundering Mach 5, Speed Racer was born to race cars. But when Speed turns down a lucrative offer from Royalton Industries, he not only infuriates the company's maniacal owner but uncovers a terrible secret – some of the biggest races are being fixed by a handful of ruthless moguls! The only way for Speed to save his family's business and the sport he loves is to beat Royalton at his own game. With the support of his family and his loyal girlfriend, Trixie, Speed teams with his one-time rival – the mysterious Racer X – to win the race that took his brother, Rex Racer's, life: the death-defying, cross-country rally known as The Crucible.

programme.title: CSI: NY S8 Ep13
programme.desc: The Ripple Effect - When the CSIs investigate two seemingly unrelated deaths, their separate trails of evidence lead to a surprisingly connected conclusion.

programme.title: FBI: International S2 Ep8

programme.title: NCIS: Hawai'i S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Breach - When a ransomware attempt causes a dam to malfunction, Ernie and a team of hackers are tasked to find the culprit quickly, before all power and water is cut off on the island.

programme.title: CSI: Vegas S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Legacy - In the premiere episode, an attack on Jim Brass kicks off a twisted conspiracy targeting the Las Vegas crime lab.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S5 Ep7
programme.desc: Keep The Faith - Hondo (Shemar Moore) returns as S.W.A.T. leader. The team has a dangerous case involving a large stack of cash and the Russian mob. Hondo's dad opens up about a painful part of his past.

programme.title: FBI S5 Ep13
programme.desc: Protégé - The team investigates the murder of a professional informant after he's found dead outside an abandoned factory in Red Hook. Also, Maggie reconnects with an old colleague and mentor (Joelle Carter).

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted S4 Ep13
programme.desc: Transaction - FBI: MOST WANTED is a high-stakes drama that focuses on the Fugitive Task Force, which relentlessly tracks and captures the notorious criminals on the Bureau’s Most Wanted list.

programme.title: The Love Boat S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Last Of The Stubings/ The Million Dollar Man/ The Sisters - Stubing's clumsy nephew comes on board to be trained to work on ships, but has a secret. programme.title: Small Wonder S3 Ep04
programme.desc: Bride & Groom - The daughter of Ted's new boss has plans on making Jamie her husband.

programme.title: The Nanny S2 Ep07

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep09

programme.title: Married... With Children S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Impo-Dent - When Marcy accidentally dents Steve’s brand new Mercedes, she finds it affects more than just his performance on the road.

programme.title: Cheers S2 Ep07
programme.desc: Old Flames - Sam’s newly divorced friend tries to come between him and Diane.

programme.title: The Love Boat S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Inspector/ A Very Special Girl/ Until The Last Goodbye - Melanie is popular with men while her friend Jane is ignored. Brian Sherwood spends a lot of time with a younger woman. programme.title: The Love Boat S1 Ep20

programme.desc: It's Okay to Say No - When a schoolyard pusher tries to hook Vicki on drugs, the Lawsons help the police on an undercover sting, to stop the pusher.

programme.title: The Love Boat S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Parents Know Best/ A Selfless Love/ The Nubile Nurse - Young man Bruce's (Mark Shera) parents (Monty Hall and Janis Paige) are determined to have him date other women on the cruise and not settle on marrying "Ginger", who is not on board. So, Bruce and a fellow passenger (Laurie Prange) get together. A man (Leslie Nielsen) is having second thoughts, about age differences, in marrying a woman (Lynda Day George) who is 21 years younger. A new nurse (Elaine Joyce), on staff for the cruise, is a pretty ex-showgirl. Of course, Doc (Bernie Kopell) is hitting on her, and is a bit frustrated, when she does not return his advances.

programme.desc: Social Media And Its Discontents - After landing tech mogul Neil Gross as a new client, the firm is tasked with figuring out a way to combat hate speech on his social media platform. Maia’s suspicions about her father grow after Uncle Jax pays an unwelcome visit. Lucca and Colin’s romance heats up.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep7
programme.desc: Not So Grand Jury - Mike Kresteva takes his case against Reddick, Boseman & Kolstad to a grand jury, but the firm devises a grand jury strategy of their own to hamper Kresteva’s efforts. Colin finds himself in an awkward position in court.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep8
programme.desc: Reddick Vs Boseman - Founding partner, Carl Reddick, makes a surprise return to the firm. A renowned local pastor needs the firm’s help in a legal matter that threatens to ruin his legacy. Lucca unexpectedly meets Colin’s parents. Meanwhile, Henry attempts to reconnect with Maia.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep9
programme.desc: Self Condemned - Diane and Adrian find themselves involved in another police brutality case, this time representing a surprising but familiar face, Colin Sweeney. Lucca represents Maia for her interview with a federal investigator seeking information on the Rindell scandal.

programme.title: The Good Fight Ep10
programme.desc: Chaos - Season finale. Diane takes on a new client who is accused of cyber-terrorism, resulting in unforeseen repercussions for the firm, especially Lucca. An accident brings Diane and Kurt together. Henry reveals new truths about the scandal to Maia.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep2
programme.desc: Teacher Jail - Despite his love of teacher jail where he's paid to not teach, Jack betrays the boisterous union rep who got him there in favor of Principal Durbin.

programme.desc: Overachieving Virgins - While Principal Durbin struggles with budget cuts, Jack discovers his students pity him so he rallies, making a splash at the school bake sale and getting kicked out of the bookstore for life.

programme.desc: Switzerland via Alpina: Part 1 - Join Ryan and his team as they explore the city of Zurich, and then set out from Vaduz in Liechtenstein to embark on this mammoth trek towards Montreux on the shores of Lake Geneva, in this double episode of Extreme Treks.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet 1 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Antarctica - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of Antarctica and its inhabitants, and the challenges faced due to the changing climate.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild 3 S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Australia - Ben Fogle returns to the Australian outback to revisit Barbara Walker, who has been living alone in a remote site for sixteen years.

programme.title: Spy in the Ocean 1 S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Deep Feelings - The spies seek out proof of emotions in the animals and fish they interact with. Spy dolphin tries to keep up with real dolphins as they play in the surf; spy sperm whale sees a calf's mother's loving bond; spy cuttlefish discovers that male cuttlefish can be very jealous and spy seal helps a lonely seal pup to join the older pups in play.

programme.title: Inside the Factory 6 S6 Ep5
programme.desc: Chairs - Gregg Wallace and the team look inside a furniture factory making chair, following it from carving wood to making the finish product.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet 1 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Antarctica - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of Antarctica and its inhabitants, and the challenges faced due to the changing climate.

programme.title: Inside the Factory 6 S6 Ep6
programme.desc: Maltloaf - Gregg Wallace sees how maltloaf is produced on a mass-scale.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia 1 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is Arabia's most remarkable treasure. It is a land of surprising beauty filled with unexpected natural wonders, home to some of the rarest animals on Earth - the Arabian Leopard, Arabian Oryx, Green and Hawksbill Turtles - and many more creatures including Arabian Fox, Striped Hyena, Whale Sharks and other sea creatures. Oman's landscape is as diverse as the variety of unique creatures that it supports.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong 1 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Arriving late at night in bustling downtown Seoul, Alexander kicks off his epic Korean adventure in Gangnam, the fabled district immortalised by Psy's Gangnam Style video - the most viewed song on YouTube.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth 1 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lightning - In Arizona, lightning strikes from so high above the ground, through such clear air, that it creates the perfect conditions for the most electrifying show on Earth.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing 1 S1 Ep7
programme.desc: San Diego - In San Diego, Robson aims to become only the second angler in the world to have registered the Shark Grand Slam by reeling in three different species of fish in a single day.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealand’s Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs - Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Delta Discoveries - The Western Arctic’s mammoth Mackenzie Delta is the second largest in North America after the Mississippi. Here we find strange and mysterious land forms above an immense underbelly of permafrost featuring a phenomenal diversity of microorganisms, and strange creatures that tell a story of an ever changing Arctic. This is the migratory destination - and summer home - to several million birds, fish, animals. .. and humans.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fall on the Tundra - Nunavik, meaning “Great Land”, is bigger than California. It is a pristine wilderness of water, forest and tundra, and home to the Inuit of Northern Quebec.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rivers - Wild Wild East swims in the Rivers of Nova Scotia. Two species of fish, the Shad and the Gaspereau swim upstream to their ancestral spawning grounds, while a colony of Double-Crested Cormorants thrive on the mouth of the Pictou River.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Leaping Into Life - It’s spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Warriors of the Llanos - The flat savannas of the Colombian Llanos are governed by seasonal extremes that push life to the brink. In this unforgiving arena, there are no second chances, and only creatures best adapted to their brutal extremes will make it through a year.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Skies - Take to the sky to soar with the Bald Eagle. From Cape Breton’s Bras d’Or Lake, to the bird’s overwintering home in the Annapolis Valley, the Eagle’s raise families, hunt and forage for food, and compete for territory with another bird of prey, the Osprey.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealand’s Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fall on the Tundra - Nunavik, meaning “Great Land”, is bigger than California. It is a pristine wilderness of water, forest and tundra, and home to the Inuit of Northern Quebec.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tides - Follow the ebb and flow of the tides. Over a hundred thousand sandpipers migrating from the Arctic to South America make a pit stop along the Bay of Fundy. On the other side of Nova Scotia, the rocky-coastline provides a home for harbor and grey seals.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pollinators - The Annapolis Valley is the Wild Wild East’s most important agricultural center. We dive into the hive to explore the complex social structures of hardworking honeybees. The Monarch butterfly has traveled all the way from Mexico to feed off the local milkweed.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Great Escape - Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Finding a Family - Mona, a female cotton top tamarin is all alone in her tropical forest home. She has left the security of her birth family to search for an unrelated troop which might provide her with a future mate.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu - Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealand’s South Island, where one of the world’s longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun - Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Delta Discoveries - The Western Arctic’s mammoth Mackenzie Delta is the second largest in North America after the Mississippi. Here we find strange and mysterious land forms above an immense underbelly of permafrost featuring a phenomenal diversity of microorganisms, and strange creatures that tell a story of an ever changing Arctic.
